level.heading: PROGRAM CHANGES REQUIRING BOARD NOTIFICATION (ยง 17-5611)

level.text: A program shall notify the Board within thirty (30) days of making any of the following changes to its program:
Change in the nurse administrator or program coordinator. The program shall submit proof that the new nurse administrator or coordinator meets the requirements of this chapter;
Change in the length of the program; or
Change in its national accreditation status.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7190 (July 23, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 2116 (March 9, 2007).
